import React from "react"; import Logo from "./Logo"; import Sidebar from "./SideBar"; import { useState } from "react"; const ProductForm = () => { const [productId, setProductId] = useState(""); const [productName, setProductName] = useState(""); const [productPrice, setProductPrice] = useState(""); const [productImage, setProductImage] = useState(""); const [productManufacturer, setProductManufacturer] = useState(""); const [productCondition, setProductCondition] = useState(""); const [productDiscount, setProductDiscount] = useState(""); const [product, setProduct] = useState(""); const formStyle = { margin: "20px", }; const inputStyle = { width: "100%", padding: "8px", margin: "5px 0", boxSizing: "border-box", }; const buttonStyle = { float: "right", height: "20px", margin: "20px", marginRight: "10px", }; const handleForm = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const productData = { productId, productName, productPrice, productImage, productManufacturer, productCondition, productDiscount, product, }; } return (
